stretches.name: Ankle Rolls
stretches.description: Sit or stand, lift one foot and rotate ankle in circles, then switch.
stretches.advice: Keep the movement controlled, focus on full range.

stretches.name: Hip Circles
stretches.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, place hands on hips, make large circles.
stretches.advice: Movements should be fluid, knees slightly bent.

stretches.name: Quad Stretch
stretches.description: Stand, pull one heel towards buttock, hold ankle. Switch legs.
stretches.advice: Keep your balance, avoid leaning forward.

stretches.name: Lateral Lunges
stretches.description: Step one foot out to the side, squat low, return to center. Alternate sides.
stretches.advice: Keep chest up, knee tracking over toes.

stretches.name: Calf Raises
stretches.description: Stand, rise onto toes, hold, then lower slowly.

stretches.name: Glute Bridges
stretches.description: Lie on back, bend knees, lift hips toward the ceiling, hold.
stretches.advice: Engage core, squeeze glutes at the top.

stretches.name: Step-Back Lunges
stretches.description: Stand, step one leg back into a lunge, lower, push back to standing. Alternate legs.
stretches.advice: Keep front knee aligned, move slowly.

stretches.name: Side Lunges
stretches.description: Step one foot out to the side, squat low, return to center. Switch sides.
stretches.advice: Keep movements steady, avoid letting knee go past toes.

stretches.name: Plie Squats
stretches.description: Stand with feet wider than shoulder-width apart, squat down, keeping chest up.
stretches.advice: Keep knees tracking over toes, move smoothly.

stretches.name: Walking Lunges
stretches.description: Step forward into a lunge, lower body, step back, alternate legs.
stretches.advice: Maintain balance, keep front knee aligned over ankle.
